title: Meitantei Pikachu: Kareinaru Morning Routine

alternative_titles.en: Detective Pikachu & the Mystery of the Missing Flan
alternative_titles.ja: 名探偵ピカチュウ ～華麗なるモーニングルーティン～

synopsis:
Detective Pikachu just wants to film his morning routine, but Tim has a bigger problem: his flan has disappeared from the fridge! It's definitely a mysterious case, but if anyone can solve it, this dynamic duo can in this animated short!

(Source: YouTube)
